Text: I dont get it rreally, What kinda files are they, or , what makes it all ~500mb, its one album ,  ?
they are in a lossless codec so you dont lose sound quality like in mp3, ogg, aac ect. its pretty much a highly compressed .wav files. google the word flac and you'll learn more.
u can also play flac files in vlc media wich u can get for free from google searching vlc media player

With a couple simple add on you can even play .flac files in Windows Media Player and Windows Media Center. 

If you can run Rock Box 3.x on your iPod you can even use your .flac files on that too.
